English.Char_Desc_2000:
Messenger for Desktop is a simple & beautiful desktop client for Facebook Messenger which runs on OS X, Windows and Linux.
It was built with nw.js and it's basically messenger.com packaged inside a native app.
Additional features: native notifications, badge, tray icon, launch on startup and themes.
The app is open source and it's available on GitHub: https://github.com/Aluxian/Facebook-Messenger-Desktop
